name: Acceptance Criteria - Alliance Approved prior to construction start

Acceptance Criteria - As required for scope of works, in place prior to any excavation
Verifying Records - Signe Permit to Work
Acceptance Criteria - Material complies to TNZ M/3

Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to Subbase Construction

Acceptance Criteria - Material Complies to TNZ M04
Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to Basecourse Construction
Verifying Records - Email Approval from QMR
Acceptance Criteria - Soaked CBR: Min. 3 per section (IANZ-accredited laboratory), Unsoaked CBR: Min. 3 per section, Moisture Content: Min. 3 per section
Inspection Test: Frequency - Minimum 3 tests per site
Verifying Records - Lab Reports to Design Verifier
Acceptance Criteria - Approved through Alliance Engineering/Quality Team
Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to Construction
Verifying Records - Email Acceptance from QMR
Acceptance Criteria - Complies to NZTA F/3 Pipe Bedding and Backfilling for Flexible Pipes – Class A
Applicable Standard - Pipe Bedding and Backfilling for Flexible Pipes
Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to Construction
Verifying Records - Email Acceptance from QMR
Acceptance Criteria - Area stripped of all topsoil and organic material
Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to Subgrade cut
Verifying Records - Site Record Sheet, Photos
Acceptance Criteria - Cut to design levels – Topographic survey 5m x5m Grid
Inspection Test: Frequency - Post subgrade cut
Acceptance Criteria - Scala Penetrometer (NZS 4402:1986 Sec. 6.5.2) at 50 mm intervals to 1000 mm depth, every 10 m chainage
Acceptance Criteria - Visual inspection & roller observation - No soft spots, deflection, or pumping
Acceptance Criteria - Unsuitable subgrade material removed, and excavation backfilled in 200mm layers (GAP65) to 95% MDD
Verifying Records - Site Records / NDM test sheet
Acceptance Criteria - Approval to proceed with Subbase
Inspection Test: Frequency - On completion of Subgrade testing
Verifying Records - Approval to proceed from Design Verifier
Acceptance Criteria - SIL Thickness as per SIL Design note, 200mm – 300mm
Inspection Test: Frequency - During Sil Construction
Acceptance Criteria - Mean percentage of MDD not less than 95% with no single result less than 92%
Inspection Test: Frequency - Not less than one test per 150m2
Verifying Records - Site Records / NDM test sheet
Acceptance Criteria - Visual inspection & roller observation - No soft spots, deflection, or pumping
Inspection Test: Frequency - One pass on each lane
Acceptance Criteria - Mean percentage of MDD not less than 95% with no single result less than 92%
Inspection Test: Frequency - Not less than one test per 150m2
Verifying Records - Site Records / NDM test sheet
Acceptance Criteria - +15mm/-15mm from design level. Thickness of subbase shall be within 15mm of design thickness
Acceptance Criteria - Visual inspection & roller observation - No soft spots, deflection, or pumping
Inspection Test: Frequency - One pass on each lane
Acceptance Criteria - Mean percentage of MDD not less than 98% with no single result less than 95%
Inspection Test: Frequency - Not less than one test per 150m2
Verifying Records - Site Records / NDM test sheet
Acceptance Criteria - +5mm/-15mm from design level. Thickness of subbase shall be within 15mm of design thickness
Acceptance Criteria - Finished surface shall not vary more than +-15mm when tested with a 3m straightedge
Acceptance Criteria - Approval to proceed with Surfacing
Verifying Records - Approval to Proceed from Design Verifier
Acceptance Criteria - Culverts shall be set out and laid where shown in the drawings
Inspection Test: Frequency - Before excavation of drain lines
Acceptance Criteria - Trench Excavated to subgrade level, If excavation exceeds 1.5m trench battered at 1:1 or benched as required, 600m cover to top of pipe.
Inspection Test: Frequency - During Trench Excavation
Acceptance Criteria - Assumed subgrade CBR 4%, visual inspection on site, organic material removed, geotextile prior to Bedding placement
Inspection Test: Frequency - Prior to placing Bedding material
Inspection Test: Frequency - Check during bedding placement
Acceptance Criteria - As per design levels and grades
Inspection Test: Frequency - Post pipe placement
Acceptance Criteria - As per manufacturers specification
Inspection Test: Frequency - Inspection post jointing
Acceptance Criteria - Approved material compacted in 150mm lifts to 95% MDD
Inspection Test: Frequency - Backfill post pipe placement

Acceptance Criteria - All As-Builts provided Alliance Quality Team within one month of completion
